Nemesis Enforcer/Oblitertron:


Nemesis Enforcer nodded at Zardus' orders.

---

Oblitertron yelled as Prowl openly challenged him by saving that annoying 
female robot who wanted to trick him.  Opening his mouth, a 'continous' blast 
of flames shot out at Iron Raptor and Prowl.
